verses.name: Jeremiah 17:7
verses.text: Blessed is the man that trusteth in the Lord, and whose hope the Lord is.

verses.name: Jeremiah 17:8
verses.text: For he shall be as a tree planted by the waters, and that spreadeth out her roots by the river, and shall not see when heat cometh, but her leaf shall be green; and shall not be careful in the year of drought, neither shall cease from yielding fruit.

verses.name: Jeremiah 17:9
verses.text: The heart is deceitful above all things, and desperately wicked: who can know it?
